mapper.select:
select
,p.pipe_name,c.name cluster_name from ci_pipe_history h left join ci_pipeline p on p.id=h.pipe_id left join erm_app_cluster c on p.cluster_id=c.id where h.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
